name: levelupyourcareer.today
description: Official website for the eBook 'Level-Up Your Career Today: Developer Edition' by Jack Domleo

scripts.build: node-sass scss/normalize.scss css/normalize.min.css --output-style compressed && node-sass scss/main.scss css/index.min.css --output-style compressed && npx postcss css/index.min.css --use autoprefixer --replace --no-map
